name: Support for PlantUML in notes
description: This script renders text based diagram descriptions into image files using the program PlantUML. Features - Backround diagram rendering - Offline rendering - Cache system that renders only new or modified diagram descriptions - Diagram rendering in PNG or SVG - Context menu to add header/footer of most PlantUML diagram types Dependencies It needs JAVA (https://java.com/en/download/) and PlantUML (http://plantuml.com/download) to be installed. Installation 1. Download PlantUML with GraphViz support. 2. Verify or install JAVA or OpenJDK. 3. In QOwnNotes, go to "Scriptingâ†’Find scripts in script repository" menu. And install "Support for PlantUML in notes". 4. In the script parameters below configure JAVA and plantuml.jar full paths. 5. Enjoy!
